Package ohos.agp.components

Class Component.MeasureSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component.MeasureSpec
  • Enclosing class:
    Component
    Deprecated. 
    use EstimateSpec instead.

    @Deprecated
public static class Component.MeasureSpec
extends Object
    Defines the measure specifications of a component.

    A MeasureSpec encapsulates the layout requirements a child inherits from the parent. Each MeasureSpec indicates the requirement for either the width or height as well as a mode. There are three possible modes for MeasureSpec: UNCONSTRAINT, PRECISE, and NOT_EXCEED.

    Since:
    1

      • NOT_EXCEED

        @Deprecated
public static final int NOT_EXCEED
        Deprecated. 
        In this mode, the maximum size has been specified for the child. The child cannot exceed the specified size.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRECISE

        @Deprecated
public static final int PRECISE
        Deprecated. 
        In this mode, the parent has determined the exact size of the child.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNCONSTRAINT

        @Deprecated
public static final int UNCONSTRAINT
        Deprecated. 
        In this mode, the parent has no constraint on the child, meaning that the child can be whatever size it wants.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getMeasureSpec

        @Deprecated
public static int getMeasureSpec​(int size,
                                 int mode)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a measure specification based on the specified size and mode.
        Parameters:
        size - Indicates the size contained in the measure specification. The value ranges from 0 to (1 shifted left by shifting MeasureSpec.MODE_SHIFT bits), including 1.
        mode - Indicates the mode contained in the measure specification. The value must be UNCONSTRAINT, PRECISE, or NOT_EXCEED.
        Returns:
        Returns the new measure specification.
        Since:
        4

        @Deprecated
public static int getSizeAndConfig​(int size,
